A Thank You to our Donors!

You can donate too!

We are deeply passionate about robotics and enjoy designing, building, and programming our robot, as well as reaching out to local communities to teach and excite children about this wonderful activity, but everything comes with a cost and robotics parts can be quite pricey. Your donation would not only help the team continue our top-level performance, but also benefit our local communities and children who have learned a great deal from our outreach events.
